title: AWS Cloud Infrastructure Project
summary: Deployed a Windows-based web server on AWS using CDK pipeline with seamless integration of Bitbucket and Bamboo for CI/CD.
content:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const t={h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(n,{children:[e(t.h1,{children:"AWS Cloud Infrastructure Project"}),"
",e(t.p,{children:"A comprehensive cloud infrastructure solution that demonstrates enterprise-level deployment practices with automated CI/CD pipelines and secure data management."}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Project Overview"}),"
",e(t.p,{children:"This project showcases the deployment of a robust Windows-based web application on AWS infrastructure, featuring automated deployment pipelines, secure authentication, and real-time data synchronization from Active Directory."}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Key Features"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Cloud-Native Deployment"}),": Windows-based web server hosted on AWS"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"CI/CD Pipeline"}),": Automated deployment using CDK, Bitbucket, and Bamboo"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Secure Authentication"}),": Windows Authentication with strict access controls"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Automated Data Sync"}),": Real-time Active Directory integration"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Dynamic Web Interface"}),": Data fetching and display from multiple sources"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Technical Architecture"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Cloud Infrastructure (AWS)"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"EC2 Windows Server"}),": Hosted web application server"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"CDK Pipeline"}),": Infrastructure as Code deployment"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"VPC Configuration"}),": Secure network architecture"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Security Groups"}),": Controlled access and traffic management"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"CI/CD Pipeline"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Bitbucket"}),": Source code management and version control"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Bamboo"}),": Continuous integration and deployment automation"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Automated Testing"}),": Quality assurance in deployment pipeline"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Environment Management"}),": Staging and production deployments"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Data Management"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"SQL Database"}),": Centralized data storage and management"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Active Directory Integration"}),": Automated user and organizational data sync"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"PowerShell Automation"}),": Scheduled tasks for data population"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"ADSI Access"}),": Direct Active Directory Service Interface integration"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Development Highlights"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Infrastructure as Code"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",e(t.li,{children:"Implemented AWS CDK for reproducible infrastructure deployment"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"Version-controlled infrastructure changes"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"Automated rollback capabilities"}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Security Implementation"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Windows Authentication"}),": Integrated enterprise-level security"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Access Control"}),": Role-based permissions and restrictions"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Network Security"}),": Properly configured security groups and VPCs"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Data Protection"}),": Secure transmission and storage protocols"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Automation Solutions"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"PowerShell Scripts"}),": Automated data synchronization tasks"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Scheduled Operations"}),": Regular database updates from Active Directory"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Error Handling"}),": Robust exception management and logging"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Monitoring"}),": System health and performance tracking"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Technical Challenges & Solutions"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Integration Complexity"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Seamlessly integrating multiple enterprise systems"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Developed comprehensive API layer for system communication"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Security Requirements"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Maintaining strict security while enabling functionality"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Implemented layered security approach with Windows Authentication"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Automation Reliability"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Ensuring consistent automated data synchronization"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Built robust error handling and retry mechanisms"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Impact & Results"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Deployment Efficiency"}),": Reduced deployment time by 70% through automation"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Security Compliance"}),": Met enterprise security standards"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Data Accuracy"}),": Achieved 99.9% data synchronization accuracy"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"System Reliability"}),": Maintained 99.5% uptime performance"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Skills Demonstrated"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Cloud Architecture"}),": AWS infrastructure design and implementation"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"DevOps Practices"}),": CI/CD pipeline development and management"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Database Management"}),": SQL database design and administration"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Security Implementation"}),": Enterprise-level authentication and authorization"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Automation Development"}),": PowerShell scripting and task scheduling"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"System Integration"}),": Multi-platform system communication and data flow"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"Technologies Used"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Cloud Platform"}),": Amazon Web Services (AWS)"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Database"}),": SQL Server"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Version Control"}),": Bitbucket"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"CI/CD"}),": Bamboo"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Scripting"}),": PowerShell"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Authentication"}),": Windows Active Directory"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Infrastructure"}),": AWS CDK"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Monitoring"}),": CloudWatch"]}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: iOS Text-to-Speech App
summary: A powerful text-to-speech tool that allows users to input a URL link and obtain an audio rendition of any webpage.
content:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const r={h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return i(n,{children:[e(r.h1,{children:"iOS Text-to-Speech App"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"A comprehensive mobile application that bridges the gap between web content and audio accessibility by converting webpage content into high-quality speech."}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Project Overview"}),"
",e(r.p,{children:"This iOS application revolutionizes how users consume web content by providing an intuitive solution for converting any webpage into audio format. The app combines powerful Python backend processing with a sleek Swift frontend."}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Key Features"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"URL-Based Content Extraction"}),": Simply input any webpage URL"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Intelligent Text Processing"}),": Advanced algorithms for clean text extraction"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"High-Quality Speech Synthesis"}),": Natural-sounding voice output"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"User-Friendly Interface"}),": Intuitive Swift-based mobile interface"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Cross-Platform Backend"}),": Python-powered content processing"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Technical Implementation"}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"Backend Processing (Python)"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Web Scraping"}),": Efficient webpage content extraction"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Content Cleaning"}),": Advanced text processing to remove HTML artifacts"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Text Optimization"}),": Preparation for high-quality speech synthesis"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"API Integration"}),": Seamless communication with iOS frontend"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"Frontend Development (Swift)"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Native iOS Interface"}),": Built using Swift for optimal performance"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Intuitive Design"}),": User-friendly navigation and controls"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Audio Controls"}),": Play, pause, and speed adjustment features"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"URL Input Validation"}),": Robust error handling and user feedback"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Development Challenges & Solutions"}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"Content Extraction"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Accurately extracting readable content from diverse webpage structures"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Implemented robust parsing algorithms to handle various HTML layouts"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"Audio Quality"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Ensuring natural-sounding speech output"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Fine-tuned text processing pipeline for optimal speech synthesis"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h3,{children:"User Experience"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Challenge"}),": Creating an intuitive interface for URL input and audio control"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Solution"}),": Designed minimalist UI with clear visual feedback and easy controls"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Impact & Results"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",e(r.li,{children:"Created a valuable accessibility tool for web content consumption"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Demonstrated proficiency in both mobile development and backend processing"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Successfully integrated Python and Swift technologies"}),"
",e(r.li,{children:"Delivered a complete end-to-end solution from concept to deployment"}),"
"]}),"
",e(r.h2,{children:"Technical Skills Demonstrated"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Mobile Development"}),": iOS app development with Swift"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Backend Processing"}),": Python-based web scraping and text processing"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"API Design"}),": Seamless frontend-backend communication"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"User Experience"}),": Intuitive interface design and implementation"]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[e(r.strong,{children:"Cross-Platform Integration"}),": Combining different technologies effectively"]}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: Portfolio Website
summary: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a clean design with dark/light mode support and showcases my projects and experience.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const t={h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(e,{children:[n(t.h1,{children:"Portfolio Website"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a clean design with dark/light mode support and showcases my projects and experience."}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Project Overview"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"This portfolio website represents my personal brand and showcases my work as a software developer. Built with modern web technologies, it demonstrates my skills in React, Next.js, and responsive design while providing an engaging user experience."}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Technical Implementation"}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Frontend Architecture"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Next.js 14"})," with App Router for optimal performance and SEO"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"TypeScript"})," for type safety and better developer experience"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Tailwind CSS"})," for utility-first styling and design consistency"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Framer Motion"})," for smooth animations and micro-interactions"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Content Management"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"MDX"})," for writing rich content with embedded React components"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Velite"})," for content layer management and type generation"]}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Static site generation for optimal performance"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Design System"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Custom design tokens for consistent spacing, colors, and typography"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Dark and light theme support with system preference detection"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Responsive design following mobile-first principles"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Accessibility features including keyboard navigation and screen reader support"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Key Features"}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Interactive Components"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Animated hero section with typing effects"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Project filtering and search functionality"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Contact form with server-side validation"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Theme toggle with smooth transitions"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Performance Optimizations"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Image optimization with Next.js Image component"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Code splitting and lazy loading"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Minimal JavaScript bundle size"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Static generation for fast page loads"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"SEO and Analytics"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Meta tags and Open Graph optimization"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Structured data markup"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Sitemap generation"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"View and like tracking for projects"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Development Process"}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Planning and Design"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Started with wireframes and design mockups, focusing on clean aesthetics and user experience. The design emphasizes content while maintaining visual interest through subtle animations and a cohesive color scheme."}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Implementation Approach"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Component-driven development with reusable UI elements"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Progressive enhancement for accessibility"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Mobile-first responsive design"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Continuous integration and deployment pipeline"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Testing and Optimization"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Performance testing with Lighthouse"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Cross-browser compatibility testing"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Accessibility audits and improvements"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Load time optimization"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Results and Impact"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"The portfolio website successfully showcases my technical abilities while providing an excellent user experience. Key achievements include:"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Perfect Lighthouse Scores"}),": 100/100 across all metrics"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Fast Load Times"}),": Sub-second initial page loads"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Responsive Design"}),": Seamless experience across all devices"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Modern Stack"}),": Demonstrates proficiency with current web technologies"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"Future Enhancements"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Plans for continued improvement include:"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"Blog section for technical writing"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Advanced analytics and insights"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Progressive Web App features"}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Multi-language support"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"This project demonstrates my ability to create modern, performant web applications while maintaining clean code and excellent user experience."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
